v4.0.13 release notes

  • Release date: 2015-04-21
  • Downloads

What's New

  • Multimedia: Fixed the controls not loading for the Flash fallback Fixes #6645.
  • Geomap: Replaced deprecated table highlight class.
  • Core: Improved handling of nested plugin/polyfill elements.
  • Site: Link to jQuery using https Fix #6658.
  • Plugins: Fix Pinterest share functionality.
  • Core: Fixed firing of ready events with nested elements.
  • Secondary menu: Fix hover issue for contrast ratio on base WET theme. Contrast ratio fails at 3.0:1, fixed to 60% and achieves 5.7:1.
  • Site: Standardized the generation of footer resources.
  • Site: Removed duplicate i18n data.
  • Site: fixed the language demos links in the french pages.

Details

Number of commits: 13

  • @LaurentGoderre: 7 commits
  • @pjackson28: 2 commits
  • @jvanulde : 2 commits
  • @rlambert27 : 1 commits
  • @num3thod : 1 commits

List of commits

  • Updated the build version to v4.0.13-development - Laurent Goderre, 2015-03-23 16:44:37 -0400
  • Multimedia: Fixed the controls not loading for the Flash fallback Fixes #6645 - Laurent Goderre, 2015-03-26 11:21:30 -0400
  • Build: Fixed Javascript code style errors - Laurent Goderre, 2015-03-27 11:44:46 -0400
  • Addresses issue #6523 - Joost van Ulden, 2015-03-27 15:22:11 -0700
  • Replaced deprecated table highlight class. - Joost van Ulden, 2015-03-30 06:48:39 -0700
  • Core: Improved handling of nested plugin/polyfill elements. - Paul Jackson, 2015-04-02 16:58:34 -0400
  • Site: Link to jQuery using https Fix #6658 - Laurent Goderre, 2015-04-07 14:41:19 -0400
  • Fix Pinterest share functionality. - Michel Raymond, 2015-04-09 14:21:01 -0400
  • Core: Fixed firing of ready events with nested elements - Paul Jackson, 2015-04-10 10:34:35 -0400
  • Secondary menu: Fix hover issue for contrast ratio on base WET theme. Contrast ratio fails at 3.0:1, fixed to 60% and achieves 5.7:1. - Roch Lambert, 2015-04-10 11:27:33 -0400
  • Site: Standardized the generation of footer resources - Laurent Goderre, 2015-04-14 17:30:03 -0400
  • Site: Removed duplicate i18n data - Laurent Goderre, 2015-04-14 17:30:27 -0400
  • Site: fixed the language demos links in the french pages - Laurent Goderre, 2015-04-15 14:10:31 -0400
